org.lenskit.knn.user

Interface NeighborFinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LiveNeighborFinder, SnapshotNeighborFinder

    @DefaultImplementation(value=LiveNeighborFinder.class)
public interface NeighborFinder

    Finds candidate neighbors for a user.

    Since:
    2.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<Neighbor> getCandidateNeighbors(long user, LongSet items)
      Get potential neighbors for a particular user.

    • Method Detail

      • getCandidateNeighbors

        Iterable<Neighbor> getCandidateNeighbors(long user,
                                         LongSet items)

        Get potential neighbors for a particular user.

        Parameters:
        user - The user ID whose neighbors are wanted.
        items - The items that the client needs to be able to score or recommend.
        Returns:
        A collection of potential neighbors for user. This collection may include neighbors that are not useful for scoring any item in items; the item set is just to help the neighbor finder guide its search if relevant.
